content.rendered:
The Washington DC concert is part of Bria Blessing’s North America and Canada Charity Tour to Benefit Victims of War in Ukraine.

Bria Blessing is an American born in Texas, who has lived in Ukraine for more than 16 years and is engaged in various activities in Lviv and all over Ukraine.
She calls herself an “American with Ukrainian heart”.

  • When: Friday, August 21, 2015 at 7:00pm
  • Where: First Congregational United Church of Christ. 945 G St NW, Washington, DC 20001.
  • Tickets: Order here.
  • Parking Instructions: There is a garage under the building from which you can get straight into the church building. If you use a GPS to get directions, use the address 980 G Place, N.W, Washington, DC, 20001. This will take you to the garage entrance at the back of the building. Proceed down the ramp, take a parking ticket, park in any non-reserved spot you can find, and take the church elevator up to the first floor to the church office. Bring your parking ticket with you to the ticket station at the front door. We should be able to validate your parking ticket.
